void mica2_magnet_init ()

Detailed Description

Integrated magnetometer sensor for the mica2.

This driver registers with the dev layer as two different devs, but they are intertwined in hardware so we implement it in one file.

Author:
Charles Gruenwald III
Date:
04/22/2004
